Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following an incident at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following a recent incident at Howard.

Shuttle bus service is available between Howard and Skokie/Dempster, serving all affected stations during normal hours of operation.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the #97 Skokie bus route.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #49 Western and #X49 Western Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Western/Berwyn
ShortDescription: NB #49 Western & #X49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Foster, Lincoln, Bryn Mawr and Western: due to, street blockage near Western/Berwyn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #49 Western & #X49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Foster, Lincoln, Bryn Mawr and Western: due to, street blockage near Western/Berwyn.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Pulaski. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Pulaski.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
